posts.post_title: FS: Ty Cobb Green Background SGC 1.5
posts.post_content:
Near-Perfect Left/Right centering.  Wrinkle in middle of card.  Great registration and color.  Excellent price point for a 1.5.

$4750 Shipped Insured Signature Priority Mail or Delivery at the National if Preferred.
